prompt: Return one concise English line with comma-separated tokens only: top color/style, bottom color/style, shoes color/style, bag type/color if present, salient accessories. Use lowercase, nouns/adjectives only, no verbs, no determiners, no prefixes like 'upper/lower', no negatives like 'none' or 'no'. If an item is not visible, skip it instead of writing 'none'. Keep â‰¤20 words.
notes: Designed for CLIP-friendly retrieval. Prioritize dominant colors and garment types; include pattern words (striped, plaid, logo) when evident; avoid background/action details.
